thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 94 of 625
thread.title: Jackie

author: Jackie
title: Jackie
text: I'm OBSESSED with this line. I'm plus sized (2x top, 3x bottom) and a crossfit athlete. These clothes are SO soft and comfortable and true to size. Not to mention, they're adorable and I can wear them during the day, and in the gym if i wanted too. They are incredible flattering as well. I'm stocking up before the entire plus size nation figures out how awesome this line is for us.
